data.enText: or
-ss-

data.chText: 集中（注意力、精力等于）
data.enText: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another

data.chText: 讨论集中在三个主要问题上。
data.enText: The discussion focused on three main problems.

data.chText: 每个练习各有不同的语法重点。
data.enText: Each exercise focuses on a different grammar point.

data.chText: 这次访问促使全世界关注难民困境。
data.enText: The visit helped to focus world attention on the plight of the refugees.

data.chText: （使）调节焦距

before.enText: of your eyes, a camera, etc.

data.enText: to adapt or be adjusted so that things can be seen clearly; to adjust sth so that you can see things clearly

data.chText: 睁大眼睛看清楚离你较远的物体。
data.enText: Let your eyes focus on objects that are further away from you.

data.chText: 过了好几分钟她的眼睛才适应了黑暗。
data.enText: It took a few moments for her eyes to focus in the dark.

data.chText: 在这个镜头中，摄影机对准演员的脸部。
data.enText: In this scene, the camera focuses on the actor's face.

data.chText: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。
data.enText: He focused his blue eyes on her.

data.chText: 我迅速把照相机的镜头对准孩子们。
data.enText: I quickly focused the camera on the children.

data.chText: 集中（光束于）；聚焦（于）
data.enText: to aim light onto a particular point using a lens
focuses
or
foci

data.chText: 中心点（指人或事物）
data.enText: the thing or person that people are most interested in; the act of paying special attention to sth and making people interested in it

data.chText: 这是会议上关注的主要焦点。
data.enText: It was the main focus of attention at the meeting.

data.chText: 他的评论提供了辩论的重点。
data.enText: His comments provided a focus for debate.

data.chText: 今天讲课的重点是欧洲联盟内部的税制结构。
data.enText: In today's lecture the focus will be on tax structures within the European Union.

data.chText: 这次事件使校园暴力成为焦点问题。
data.enText: The incident brought the problem of violence in schools into sharp focus .

data.chText: 我们将继续重点关注顾客的需要。
data.enText: We shall maintain our focus on the needs of the customer.

data.chText: 我们现在需要的是改变对事物的看法。
data.enText: What we need now is a change of focus (= to look at things in a different way) .

data.chText: （眼睛或镜头的）焦距，调焦
data.enText: a point or distance at which the outline of an object is clearly seen by the eye or through a lens

data.chText: 照片上孩子们的脸模糊不清。
data.enText: The children's faces are badly out of focus (= not clearly shown) in the photograph.

data.chText: 这副双筒望远镜的焦距不对。
data.enText: The binoculars were not in focus (= were not showing things clearly) .
focal point

data.chText: （光、声等的）焦点，中心点，源
data.enText: a point at which waves of light, sound, etc. meet after reflection or refraction ; the point from which waves of light, sound, etc. seem to come

data.chText: （地震的）震源
data.enText: the point at which an earthquake starts to happen

tr: maximum clarity or distinctness of an image rendered by an optical system
maximum clarity or distinctness of an idea
example: the controversy brought clearly into focus an important difference of opinion

tr: the concentration of attention or energy on something
example: the focus of activity shifted to molecular biology
he had no direction in his life

tr: a fixed reference point on the concave side of a conic section
a point of convergence of light (or other radiation) or a point from which it diverges
a central point or locus of an infection in an organism

example: the stress was more on accuracy than on speed

tr: become focussed or come into focus

example: Please focus on your studies and not on your hobbies

tr: to converge or cause to converge
cause to converge on or toward a central point
example: Focus the light on this image

value.boxr_value: The spellings focusses, focussing, focussed are also used. The plural of the noun can be either foci or focuses. 亦拼作focusses, focussing, focussed。复数形式可以是 foci 或者 focuses。

value.def: If you focus on a particular topic or if your attention is focused on it, you concentrate on it and think about it, discuss it, or deal with it, rather than dealing with other topics.

example.ex: The research effort has focused on tracing the effects of growing levels of five compounds...
example.tran: 研究重点追踪了5种化合物含量上升的影响。

example.ex: He is currently focusing on assessment and development...
example.tran: 他目前在关注评估和发展。

example.ex: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy...
example.tran: 今天他得以将主题全部集中在经济方面。

example.ex: Many of the papers focus their attention on the controversy surrounding the Foreign Secretary.
example.tran: 许多报纸都把关注的焦点放到围绕外交部长出现的争议上。

value.def: The focus of something is the main topic or main thing that it is concerned with.

example.ex: The UN's role in promoting peace is increasingly the focus of international attention...
example.tran: 联合国在促进和平方面的作用越来越受到国际社会的关注。

example.ex: The new system is the focus of controversy...
example.tran: 这个新体制是争议的焦点。

example.ex: Her children are the main focus of her life.
example.tran: 孩子们是她生活的重心。

value.def: Your focus on something is the special attention that you pay it.

example.ex: He said his sudden focus on foreign policy was not motivated by presidential politics...
example.tran: 他说他突然关注外交政策并非受总统政治的驱使。

example.ex: The report's focus is on how technology affects human life rather than business...
example.tran: 这个报告关注的是技术如何影响人类生活而非商业活动。

example.ex: IBM has also shifted its focus from mainframes to personal computers.
example.tran: IBM 公司也把重心从特大型机转向了个人电脑。

gramarinfo.label: usu sing, usu with supp, oft N <l>on</l> n

value.def: If you say that something has a focus, you mean that you can see a purpose in it.

example.ex: Somehow, though, their latest album has a focus that the others have lacked...
example.tran: 但是，他们的最新专辑设法找到了其他专辑所欠缺的一种目的性。

example.ex: Suddenly all of the bizarre and seemingly isolated examples took on a meaningful focus.
example.tran: 突然之间，所有那些怪异且看上去孤立的例子都具有了意义。

value.def: If you focus your eyes or if your eyes focus, your eyes adjust so that you can clearly see the thing that you want to look at. If you focus a camera, telescope, or other instrument, you adjust it so that you can see clearly through it.

example.ex: Kelly couldn't focus his eyes well enough to tell if the figure was male or female...
example.tran: 凯利没有看清楚那个人影到底是男的还是女的。

example.ex: His eyes slowly began to focus on what looked like a small dark ball...
example.tran: 他的眼睛慢慢开始看清楚那个看上去像是个小黑球的东西。

example.ex: He found the binoculars and focused them on the boat...
example.tran: 他找到双筒望远镜，然后调焦对准那艘船看。

example.ex: Had she kept the camera focused on the river bank she might have captured a vital scene.
example.tran: 要是她把相机的镜头一直对准河岸的话，可能就捕捉到重要的一幕了。

value.tran: 注视;使(相机、望远镜等)聚焦;给…调焦

value.def: You use focus to refer to the fact of adjusting your eyes or a camera, telescope, or other instrument, and to the degree to which you can see clearly.

example.ex: His focus switched to the little white ball...
example.tran: 他把关注点转移到那个小白球上。

example.ex: Together these factors determine the depth of focus...
example.tran: 这些因素综合起来决定了景深。

example.ex: It has no manual focus facility.
example.tran: 它没有手动调焦功能。

value.def: If you focus rays of light on a particular point, you pass them through a lens or reflect them from a mirror so that they meet at that point.

example.ex: Magnetic coils focus the electron beams into fine spots.
example.tran: 磁线圈把电子束聚焦成微小的点。

value.def: The focus of a number of rays or lines is the point at which they meet.
If an image or a camera, telescope, or other instrument is in focus, the edges of what you see are clear and sharp.

example.ex: Pictures should be in focus, with realistic colours and well composed groups.
example.tran: 照片应该图像清晰，颜色逼真，构图合理。

value.tran: (图像)清晰;(照相机、望远镜等)对准焦点

value.def: If something is in focus, it is being discussed or its purpose and nature are clear.

example.ex: This aggression is the real issue the world should be concerned about. We want to keep that in focus...
example.tran: 这次侵略才是世界应该关注的真正问题。我们想继续保持关注。

example.ex: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
example.tran: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

value.tran: 受关注;在讨论;(目的和性质)清楚的，明白的

value.def: If an image or a camera, telescope, or other instrument is out of focus, the edges of what you see are unclear.

example.ex: In some of the pictures the subjects are out of focus while the background is sharp.
example.tran: 一些照片背景很清晰，被摄主体却因失焦而显得模糊。

example.ex: ...a lot of out-of-focus photographs.
example.tran: 许多对焦不实的照片

value.def: If something is out of focus, it is not being discussed or its purpose or nature is not clear.

example.ex: The deficit in the US balance of payments put these considerations out of focus...
example.tran: 美国的国际收支逆差使这些因素没有得到关注。

example.ex: The movement towards democracy in Latin America and the foreign debt problems that have plagued it have gone out of focus.
example.tran: 拉丁美洲的民主运动和困扰该地区的外债问题已经淡出人们的视线。

value.tran: 不受关注;(目的和性质)不清晰的

trans: 专注于；关注，聚焦于
……的焦点
(图像)清晰;(照相机、望远镜等)对准焦点；受关注;在讨论;(目的和性质)清楚的，明白的
重点聚焦
不受关注;(目的和性质)不清晰的；焦点没对准;脱焦;失焦
焦点小组(选自各阶层，讨论某专项问题；所得信息常为市场研究者或某政党所用)
一切为了孩子；顾客聚焦；顾客导向；客户导向；客户至上
原发灶；主要重点；原发病灶；主要焦点；初次感染病灶
焦点；关注点；聚焦点；聚点；聚焦的点
变换焦点
集中精力于
使集中在焦点上；调节(望远镜、照相机等的)焦距；使注意力集中于，使清楚地注意到；使明确，使突出
分众；分众传媒；分众传媒控股有限公司；分众媒介
锐聚焦；强聚焦；准焦距；焦点
清晰起来
焦深；景深
福特福克斯；福特福克斯限量版
主焦点
集中化战略；集中战略；战略；聚焦战略；集中策略
自动对焦；自动聚焦；自动调焦
